body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Green Motors. My name is Henry Green. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. Can you provide me with your phone number and email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, eight eight two, nine nine one zero. And my email address is v.sanchez@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information. We will ensure it is kept confidential. Is there anything else I may assist you with today, Victoria?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, everything seems fine now. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that. Thank you for choosing Green Motors, Victoria. If you have any further questions or concerns, don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Goodbye, Victoria. Have a wonderful day.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting Green Motors. My name is Henry Green. May I have your name, please?
